plot outline: A rich business man came to his late father's land (village) and getting involved with politician's nasty politics and fight against with them to save poor farmers. He is born and grow in Europe. After knowing his father's real identity. He came to the village and save poor farmers from local politicians and goons. And make sure that every person of State will realize the importance of poor farmers and crops.
title: Bangara s/o Bangarada Manushya
akas: Bangara S/O Bangarada Manushya (India, English title)
